alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 4:51PM EDT until March 18 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... East central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Central Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 351 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Graceville to 12 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Marianna, Bradford, Live Oak, Malone, Cottondale, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Caryville, Wausau, Esto, Westville, Campbellton, Noma, Whitehead Crossroads, Gritney and Holmes Valley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
